message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily productivity and streamline your workflow. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than $150. Let's start our negotiation at $200. Looking forward to your response!
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to consider a price closer to $120, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can we meet in the middle at $150?
